parts.text: {"word":"salvar","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"(人や物を危険から)救う、助ける","english_definition":"to save (someone or something) from danger or harm.","examples":[{"sentence":"El bombero salvó al niño del incendio.","translation":"The firefighter saved the child from the fire. (消防士は火事から子供を救った。)"},{"sentence":"Necesitamos salvar el planeta.","translation":"We need to save the planet. (私たちは地球を救う必要がある。)"},{"sentence":"El médico le salvó la vida.","translation":"The doctor saved his life. (医者は彼の命を救った。)"}],"collocations":["salvar a alguien (誰かを救う)","salvar algo (何かを救う)","salvar la vida (命を救う)","salvar del peligro (危険から救う)"],"synonyms":["rescatar","auxiliar","socorrer","proteger"],"antonyms":["abandonar","desatender","perder"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"(お金や資源を)貯める、節約する","english_definition":"to save (money or resources).","examples":[{"sentence":"Estoy ahorrando para salvar dinero para un coche nuevo.","translation":"I am saving to save money for a new car. (新しい車のためにお金を貯めるために貯金している。)"},{"sentence":"Debemos salvar energía.","translation":"We must save energy. (私たちはエネルギーを節約しなければならない。)"}],"collocations":["salvar dinero (お金を貯める)","salvar energía (エネルギーを節約する)","salvar recursos (資源を節約する)"],"synonyms":["ahorrar","economizar","reservar"],"antonyms":["gastar","despilfarrar","malgastar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"(データを)保存する","english_definition":"to save (data).","examples":[{"sentence":"No olvides salvar el documento antes de cerrar el programa.","translation":"Don't forget to save the document before closing the program. (プログラムを閉じる前にドキュメントを保存するのを忘れないでください。)"}],"collocations":["salvar un archivo (ファイルを保存する)","salvar datos (データを保存する)","salvar cambios (変更を保存する)"],"synonyms":["guardar","almacenar"],"antonyms":["borrar","eliminar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","pronominal","definition":"(困難な状況を)乗り越える、切り抜ける","english_definition":"to overcome (a difficult situation).","examples":[{"sentence":"Se salvó de una situación muy peligrosa.","translation":"He got out of a very dangerous situation. (彼は非常に危険な状況を切り抜けた。)"}],"collocations":["salvarse de (～から切り抜ける)"],"synonyms":["escapar","librarse","evitar"],"antonyms":["sucumbir","caer","perderse"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の \"salvare\" (安全にする、救う) に由来。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/salˈβaɾ/","notes":"スペイン語の発音。"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["salvo","salvas","salva","salvamos","salváis","salvan"],"past_simple":["salvé","salvaste","salvó","salvamos","salvasteis","salvaron"],"future_simple":["salvaré","salvarás","salvará","salvaremos","salvaréis","salvarán"],"present_subjunctive":["salve","salves","salve","salvemos","salvéis","salven"],"past_participle":"salvado"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"\"Salvar\" は非常に一般的な動詞で、文字通りに命を救うことから、お金を貯める、データを保存するなど、幅広い意味で使用されます。再帰動詞 (\"salvarse\") として使用される場合、困難な状況から脱出することを意味します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Necesito salvar el documento a mi computadora.","correct":"Necesito guardar el documento en mi computadora.","note":"\"Salvar\" は「救う」の意味合いが強く、データを保存する場合は \"guardar\" がより適切です。"},{"incorrect":"Estoy salvando dinero en el banco.","correct":"Estoy ahorrando dinero en el banco.","note":"銀行にお金を貯める場合は、\"ahorrar\" がより一般的です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["salvación (救い、救済)","salvavidas (救命胴衣、ライフガード)","salvaje (野生の、野蛮な - 間接的な関連)"],"phrases":["¡Sálvese quien pueda! (我先に逃げろ！)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"level":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"\"Salvar\" は、人や物を危険から守る、お金を貯める、データを保存するといった意味を持つ一般的なスペイン語の動詞です。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"El perro salvó a la niña de ahogarse.","translation":"The dog saved the girl from drowning. (犬は溺れかけていた少女を救った。)"},{"sentence":"Es importante salvar agua durante la sequía.","translation":"It is important to save water during the drought. (干ばつの間は水を節約することが重要です。)"},{"sentence":"Salva tu trabajo regularmente.","translation":"Save your work regularly. (定期的に作業を保存してください。)"},{"sentence":"Se salvó por poco de ser atropellado por el coche.","translation":"He narrowly escaped being hit by the car. (彼は車に轢かれるところを間一髪で助かった。)"}]}
